p.k: Cévennes, the Robert Louis Stevenson Trail
p.d: Covering 272 km, the GR 70 is one of the most beautiful routes through the Massif Central, following that taken by the Scottish writer and great traveller Robert Louis Stevenson. Over twelve days, accompanied by the guide Marion Bailly, we discover the Velay, the Gévaudan, Mont Lozere and the Cévennes. Directed by: Laurent Bouit (France, season 2, 2018)
